title: Blog Posts
text: 여기에 마크다운으로 내용을 작성합니다. Quarto는 Pandoc 마크다운을 확장하여 다양한 기능을 제공합니다.

title: Blog Posts
text:
코드 실행
Python 코드 셀 예시입니다.

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.linspace(0, 2 * np.pi, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title("Sine Wave")
plt.xlabel("X-axis")
plt.ylabel("Y-axis")
plt.show()

print("Hello World")







Figure 1: 간단한 Matplotlib 플롯





Hello World

title: Post With Code
text:
This is a post with executable code.
#| label: fig-simple-plot #| fig-cap: “간단한 Matplotlib 플롯” #| echo: true # 코드 보여주기 (기본값) #| eval: true # 코드 실행하기 (기본값)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np
x = np.linspace(0, 2 * np.pi, 100) y = np.sin(x)
plt.plot(x, y) plt.title(“Sine Wave”) plt.xlabel(“X-axis”) plt.ylabel(“Y-axis”) plt.show()

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
